dataList.desc: ได้รับตัวตน
dataList.dlg: Equal death to something or… Tch. Whatever, I’m here to wreck stuff.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเช้า
dataList.dlg: Bollocks… Who’s the one that kept sleeping while their alarm was clanging off? I’ll make ‘em pay…

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามลางวัน
dataList.dlg: For lunch… I’d like something raw. The kind of stuff that’s got blood dripping from it.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเย็น
dataList.dlg: Ever see a red moon, mate? It’s a stoater. Fell in love with it at first sight.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #1
dataList.dlg: …Worried about my wounds? Bloody hell, that’s a right scunner. Don’t you ever say that to me again.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #2
dataList.dlg: If there’s no witnesses alive to clepe, that’s assassination—what more do you need? Buggers won’t stop narking me about it.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #3
dataList.dlg: Stabbing the jugular all the time’s frankly boring. Outright unfun even, innit?

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 1
dataList.dlg: My mates keep saying daft rubbish. All that mince about inner peace n’ quiet or what have you… Ain’t it best for all of us to just wreck shite and move on?

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 2
dataList.dlg: I like that ya turn that clock without complaining much. That hole someone jabbed in my shoulder the other day must’ve been a right bugger to heal, too.

dataList.desc: Idle
dataList.dlg: Where’d you get off to? Damn, Ishmael would’ve spotted them in seconds…

dataList.desc: ผูกมัด
dataList.dlg: I can keep on butchering ‘em ‘til you tell me to stop!

dataList.desc: เลือกเข้าทีม
dataList.dlg: Right, I’ll give you something you won’t regret!

dataList.desc: เข้าด่าน
dataList.dlg: Just have to crush everything I see, aye?

dataList.desc: ตรวบสอบตัวละครระหว่างการต่อสู้
dataList.dlg: Alright, who do you want me to scrap?

dataList.desc: สั่งจู่โจม
dataList.dlg: Aye, I’ll go cut ‘em!

dataList.desc: ศัตรูติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: How’s that? Hurts to death, don’t it?

dataList.desc: ติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Tch…!

dataList.desc: สังหารศัตรู
dataList.dlg: Target wiped~

dataList.desc: Ally Death
dataList.dlg: Shouldn’t be out in the open if you don’t have the skills to handle it.

dataList.desc: เช็คผ่าน
dataList.dlg: Look ‘ere. Process be damned, it all turned out well and fine in the end, aye?

dataList.desc: เช็คล้มเหลว
dataList.dlg: Not the first time I’m sent to do work I’m not fit for.

dataList.desc: ชัยชนะ
dataList.dlg: This was simple. Anything else for me to stab?

dataList.desc: เงื่อนไข EX ผ่าน
dataList.dlg: They were all prey to me.

dataList.desc: พ่ายแพ้
dataList.dlg: My sword says it ain’t done yet! Mate, we’re going back in!
